publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1954 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Suspension of Standing Orders—That the Parliament agrees that: Rules 9.5.3, 9.7.8 and 9.7.9 of the Standing Orders be suspended for the purposes of the Meeting of the Parliament on Wednesday 6 June 2001 at which Stages 2 and 3 of the Scottish Local Authorities (Tendering) Bill are taken, and Rule 11.8.3 of the Standing Orders be suspended for the purposes of the Committee of the Whole Parliament on Wednesday 6 June 2001 and directs that any vote to be taken shall be conducted using the electronic voting system, and (c) Rule 9.10.2A of the Standing Orders be suspended for the purposes of the Meeting of the Parliament on Wednesday 6 June 2001 at which Stage 3 of the Scottish Local Authorities (Tendering) Bill is taken. Supported by: Euan Robson*
